mapper.sql: QD_ID, QUERY_DIM_CODE, QUERY_DIM_NAME, IS_AUTH, QUERY_DIM_TYPE, QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_query_dim_tb
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from ht_query_dim_tb where OP_TYPE!='D' AND QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_query_dim_tb (QD_ID, QUERY_DIM_CODE, QUERY_DIM_NAME, IS_AUTH, QUERY_DIM_TYPE, QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_query_dim_tb
QD_ID,
QUERY_DIM_CODE,
QUERY_DIM_NAME,
IS_AUTH,
QUERY_DIM_TYPE,
QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,
#{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ht_query_dim_tb
QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUERY_DIM_CODE = #{record.queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_DIM_NAME = #{record.queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_AUTH = #{record.isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUERY_DIM_TYPE = #{record.queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE = #{record.queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_query_dim_tb set QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUERY_DIM_CODE = #{record.queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY_DIM_NAME = #{record.queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_AUTH = #{record.isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUERY_DIM_TYPE = #{record.queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE = #{record.queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_query_dim_tb
QUERY_DIM_CODE = #{queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_DIM_NAME = #{queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_AUTH = #{isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUERY_DIM_TYPE = #{queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE = #{queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_query_dim_tb set QUERY_DIM_CODE = #{queryDimCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY_DIM_NAME = #{queryDimName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_AUTH = #{isAuth,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUERY_DIM_TYPE = #{queryDimType,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE = #{queryDimShowType,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.QD_ID,a.QUERY_DIM_CODE, a.QUERY_DIM_NAME FROM ht_query_dim_tb a LEFT JOIN ht_tar_query_dim_tb b ON a.qd_id= b.qd_id LEFT JOIN ht_target_tb c ON b.target_code = c.target_code WHERE c.target_code = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.op_Type!='D' AND B.OP_TYPE!='D' AND c.OP_TYPE!='D'
select b.code_ as code, b.name_ as name from jdp_dict a left join jdp_dict_item b on a.cid = b.DICT_ID where a.code_ = 'CON_TYPE'

SELECT query_dim.QD_ID, query_dim.QUERY_DIM_CODE, query_dim.QUERY_DIM_NAME, query_dim.IS_AUTH, query_dim.QUERY_DIM_TYPE, query_dim.QUERY_DIM_SHOW_TYPE FROM ht_query_dim_tb query_dim LEFT JOIN ht_tar_query_dim_tb tar_query_dim ON tar_query_dim.QD_ID=query_dim.QD_ID AND tar_query_dim.OP_TYPE!='D' LEFT JOIN ht_target_tb target ON tar_query_dim.TARGET_CODE=target.TARGET_CODE AND target.OP_TYPE!='D' WHERE tar_query_dim.TARGET_CODE=#{targetCode} AND query_dim.OP_TYPE!='D'
select QUERY_DIM_CODE,QUERY_DIM_NAME from ht_query_dim_tb where OP_TYPE!='D'

SELECT T8.QD_ID, T8.QUERY_DIM_CODE FROM HT_QUERY_DIM_TB T8 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T4.QD_ID FROM HT_TAR_REG_QUE_TB T4 WHERE T4.TARGET_CODE IN ( SELECT T1.TARGET_CODE FROM HT_PLATE_ONE_TAR_TB T1 WHERE T1.PLATE_ID = #{blockId} AND T1.OP_TYPE != 'D' UNION SELECT T3.TARGET_CODE FROM HT_PLATE_TWO_TAR_TB T3 WHERE T3.PTTG_ID IN ( SELECT T2.PTTG_ID FROM HT_PLATE_TWO_TAR_GRO_TB T2 WHERE T2.PLATE_ID = #{blockId} AND T2.OP_TYPE != 'D' ) AND T3.OP_TYPE != 'D' ) AND T4.REG_ID IN ( SELECT T5.REG_ID FROM HT_TEM_REG_TB T5 WHERE T5.TEMP_ID IN ( SELECT T6.TEMP_ID FROM HT_TEMPLET_TB T6 WHERE T6.TEMP_CODE = 'TEMP03' ) ) ) T9 ON T8.QD_ID = T9.QD_ID
